title: POLITICI ukázali, komu vďačia za život: MAMU ministra Šaška ste ešte nevideli, to je ale KOČKA!

Na Deň matiek zdieľali osobné spomienky, niektorí aj rodinné fotografie a odkazy plné lásky, úcty a vďaky.
title_translated: Politicians have shown who they owe to life: You haven't seen Mom Minister Šašek yet, but that's a cat!
description_translated: Social networks today flooded a wave of emotion. Politicians and politicians have shown their human side and paid tribute to women who have shaped them from a cradle - their mothers. Mother's Day shared personal memories, some also family photographs and messages full of love, respect and gratitude.

title: FOTO Herec Marián Mitaš z Nemocnice: HANBA, v akých podmienkach pracujú naši lekári!
description: Marián Mitaš (44) patrí medzi našich najlepších hercov, a tak mu nerobí problém blysnúť sa v akomkoľvek charaktere. Už čoskoro sa vráti do postavy chirurga Adama Ondruša, ktorého si diváci jojkárskej Nemocnice zamilovali spoločne aj s jeho dcérkou Klárou (Dorota Mitašová). V čom bude iný a čo si myslí o stave našich nemocníc?
title_translated: PHOTO actor Marián Mitaš from the hospital: Shame, in which conditions our doctors work!
description_translated: Marián Mitaš (44) is one of our best actors, so he does not have a problem to flicker in any character. Soon he will return to the character of surgeon Adam Ondruš, whose spectators of the Jojo Hospital fell in love with his daughter Klára (Dorota Mitašová). What is different and what does he think about the condition of our hospitals?

title: VIDEO Pápež Lev XIV. vystúpil pred veriacimi: Slová o tretej svetovej vojne
description: Pápež Lev XIV. vyzval na „spravodlivý a trvalý“ mier na Ukrajine i na okamžité prímerie, prepustenie rukojemníkov a dodávky humanitárnej pomoci v Gaze. „Už nikdy viac vojnu!“ povedal pápež, ktorý sa desaťtisícom veriacich v nedeľu na poludnie prihovoril z balkóna Baziliky sv. Petra vo Vatikáne. TASR informuje podľa agentúr AFP a AP.
title_translated: Video Pope Lev XIV. spoke to the believers: Words of the Third World War
description_translated: Pope Leo XIV. He called for a "righteous and permanent" peace in Ukraine and an immediate ceasefire, the release of hostages and the supply of humanitarian aid in Gaza. “Never more war again!” said the Pope, who spoke to the tens of thousands of believers on Sunday at noon from the balcony of the Basilica of Sts. Peter in the Vatican. TASR informs according to AFP and AP.

title: Na hradnej skale v Trenčíne je ohrozený vzácny rímsky nápis: Prebieha jeho záchrana
description: Rímsky nápis na brale Trenčianskeho hradu je najvýznamnejšou epigrafickou pamiatkou v strednej Európe. Teraz ho ohrozuje voda aj nestabilný skalný previs. Odborníci začali s jeho záchranou.
title_translated: A rare Roman inscription is at risk at the castle rock in Trenčín: its rescue is ongoing
description_translated: The Roman inscription on the rock of Trenčín Castle is the most important epigraphic monument in Central Europe. It is now threatened by water and unstable rocky overhang. Experts started with it.

title: Po výstupe na vrch poslala fotku a odvtedy ju nikto nevidel: SMUTNÝ koniec pátrania po turistke

description_translated: From Friday 9. May 44-year-old Lucia were missing. Her last photo was from the steep and Skalnatý vrch Sivec above the dam Ružín. Two days later, an extremely sad news came.
